entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
